findings.title: M1: Unchecked cast
findings.description: Unchecked casting can lead to integer overflow/underflow during arithmetic operations.

findings.title: W1: Wrong version
findings.description: The getVersion function returns an incorrect version number.

findings.title: W2: Renounce ownership
findings.description: The OpenZeppelin `Ownable` pattern contains the `renounceOwnership()` function which sets the owner address to `address(0)`, leading to irreversible damage to the contract.

findings.title: W3: Commented-out code
findings.description: The function `_getTrapezoidArea` contains commented-out code, which is not a good practice.

findings.title: W4: Solidity optimizer
findings.description: The project uses `solc` optimizer which may lead to unexpected bugs and vulnerabilities.

findings.title: I1: Unnecessary variable allocation
findings.description: Unnecessary local variables have been removed, and return values are assigned directly into the `Pool.SwapObj`.

findings.title: I2: Missing documentation
findings.description: The code contains brief, understandable comments of important logic, but detailed documentation is missing.
